name: Crikle
description:
Crikle is a sales lead conversion and revenue growth platform servicing businesses in the travel and hospitality industry. By offering a way for sales agents to plan trips and packages with customers in a live, multimedia presentation environment, Crikle tackles multiple industry pain points surrounding ease and speed of communication during the booking process.

We pride ourselves in offering that important personal touch that’s often missing in our digital era of faceless companies and salespeople, allowing your company to create a unique bond of trust and familiarity between your agents and potential buyers.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Diwaker Singh
team.bioHtml: Over 35 years of business experience. Chairman, CEO and executive with major international corporations. Early stage investor in technology companies.

jobs.title: Sales Executive
jobs.description:
Crikle is a new SaaS company in SalesTech. Founded by Diwaker Singh, a serial entrepreneur with over 12 successful start-ups and exits, he knows market positioning better than most. 

The sales platform is a conversion tool to ebb the leakage of customers in a sales cycle especially in ‘High Touch’ businesses. That is to say where the business has:

•	Potentially has high transaction costs 
•	Long convoluted sales cycles 
•	Increased decision making at each touch point
•	Risk assurance required 
•	Customer experience needs to build trust 
•	Where experiences cannot be tried before you buy
•	A specialist seller is required

The platform makes these complex sales simple by a one stop shop to enable better communication, build trust, control and drive positive decision making, shrink the sales cycle, enhance the buyer experience and keep the buyer engaged.

Crikle has only recently launched their sales platform to SMEs with the business being ready for market to Enterprise sales at the beginning of Q2. The initial launch as been widely received and Crikle is looking to capitalize on the hype.

The current team is highly experienced coming from businesses such as Uber, Velocity Black, OYO and Syft and know what is required to succeed in start-ups today. 

We are looking for forward thinking, agile, positive and motivated individuals who only see solutions in problems faced, thriving in being pioneers of innovation.

The role:
•	100% New Business Development 
•	Demo Crikle to businesses 
•	Sign users to paying subscriptions (£20 per month rolling)
•	First quarter sell to SME’s / Q2 onwards Enterprise sales only 
•	Identifying new business opportunities as well as been given leads
•	Being able to quality opportunities and identify pain points
•	Managing a full sales cycle to subscription 
•	Attend trade fairs and events
•	90% Remote communication - 10% face to face (if and when required)


Experience required:
•	1-2 years experience required in front line sales 
•	Excellent presenting skills
•	Articulate on the phone 
•	Already worked in a target driven sales environment 
•	Proven success in hitting targets 

A successful candidate will be an individual that has a positive drive and eagerness to develop with a fast growing innovative tech business. They will have a personal interest in the tech industry and want to push learn how to develop into a Enterprise SaaS business development manager

Competitive salary and uncapped commissions
